text: my daughter Casey is 13 her friend
Yasmine is also 13 Casey is being raised
Jewish Yasmin is being raised Muslim for
Halloween this year they recently
decided to be the just limbs this was
not a political statement or social
statement or stance on the presidential
election they weren't doing it in the
name of religious pride or America's
diversity or equality for all nope
they decided to be the Jews limbs simply
because it was funny and as a tweet I
fired off about the two joslyn's seems
to gain more and more and more retweets
and likes by the minute
I hope the point isn't lost my daughter
and her pal are simply friends they talk
about music and clothes and snacks and
scary movies and boys in school there
are two people who moved to Southern
California in the same month two years
ago and they share a bond that's it
that's all no deep religious debates no
conflicts over prayer or the meaning
behind ancient texts now the same goes
to me and the wife and Yasmine nerds we
form a similar bond also over geography
and interests and having children of the
same age there's not even the hint of
mistrust or conflict we're all just
people trying to work our way through
this world despite what we've been
hearing late in the National Dialogue
here in America the need not be this
division based upon skin color based
from place of birth
based upon trivial nonsense we're all
just people were all just chasms
